text: Eitu khan sob huwa pichete moi saise, aru ta te bisi manu thakise kun bhi ginti kori bole napara thakise- sob desh, jati, manu, aru alag kotha kowa manu thakise- singhason aru Mer usorte khara kori thakise. Taikhan boga kapra pindhi kene thakise aru palm ghas laga pata hathte loi kene thakise,
